name: setup-project
description: Complete project setup with dependencies, environment, and hero data
instructions:
Sets up the Dota 2 Draft Helper project from scratch. This includes:
1. Installing all npm dependencies
2. Creating .env file from template (you'll need to add your STRATZ API token)
3. Fetching hero portraits from STRATZ API

Prerequisites:
- Node.js 18+ installed
- STRATZ API token (get from https://stratz.com/api)

After running:
1. Edit .env and add your STRATZ API token
2. Run 'npm run dev' to start the development server

actions.command: npm install && cp .env.example .env && npm run fetch-heroes
